name: Fx29 + Menu Panel Horizontal Icons
description: Horizontal row of small icons without text - does show icon tooltips on cursor-hover.Allows for many more buttons in the Menu Panel, to free-up toolbar space.
additional_info: Handles the default toolbar button icons. For some add-on toolbar buttons you may need to edit for each button that is added; while other add-on buttons work fine. YMMV Swiped the code from a few other UserStyles.
